mapper.insert: insert into USER(user_id, user_pw, user_name, user_age, user_gen, user_email, user_phone, user_salary, user_size, user_stay, user_like, optradio ) values(#{user_id}, #{user_pw}, #{user_name}, concat(#{user_year},"-", #{user_month}, "-", #{user_day}), #{user_gen}, #{user_email}, #{user_phone}, #{user_salary}, #{user_size}, #{user_stay}, #{user_like}, #{optradio} )
mapper.select: select * from USER where user_id = #{login_id} and user_pw = #{login_pw}
mapper.update: update USER set user_id = #{user_id}, user_pw = #{user_pw}, user_name = #{user_name}, user_age = concat(#{user_year},"-", #{user_month}, "-", #{user_day}), user_gen = #{user_gen}, user_email = #{user_email}, user_phone = #{user_phone}, user_salary = #{user_salary}, user_size = #{user_size}, user_stay = #{user_stay}, user_like = #{user_like}, optradio = #{optradio} Where user_num = #{user_num}
mapper.select: select ADOPT_LIST_NUM, USER_ID, ADOPT_LIST_NAME, ADOPT_LIST_TYPE, ADOPT_LIST_CONTENT, DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d') as ADOPT_LIST_DATE, if(date_format(now(), '%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_ADD(STR_TO_DATE(ADOPT_LIST_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d'), INTERVAL 3 DAY), '입양진행중', '입양완료') as ADOPT_LIST_PROGRESS from ADOPTLIST where user_id = #{user_id}
